puzzle.help: 1. The board represents a park, where there are some hidden lakes, all square in shape. 2. You have to find the lakes with the aid of hints, knowing that: 3. A number tells you the total size of the any lakes orthogonally touching it, while a question mark tells you that there is at least one lake orthogonally touching it. 4. Lakes aren't on tiles with numbers or question marks. 5. All the land tiles are connected horizontally or vertically.
